text: Thomas Tuchel (; born 29 August 1973) is a German professional football coach and former player who was most recently the head coach of Bayern Munich, he departed the club at the club at the end of the 2023–2024 season. ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record FC Augsburg II 1 July 2007 30 June 2008 Mainz 05 3 August 2009 11 May 2014 Borussia Dortmund 29 June 2015 30 May 2017 Paris Saint-Germain 14 May 2018 24 December 2020 Chelsea 26 January 2021 7 September 2022 Bayern Munich 24 March 2023 Present Total ==Honours== ===Manager=== Borussia Dortmund *DFB- Pokal: 2016–17; runner-up: 2015–16 Paris Saint-Germain *Ligue 1: 2018–19, 2019–20 *Coupe de France: 2019–20; runner-up: 2018–19 *Coupe de la Ligue: 2019–20 *Trophée des Champions: 2018, 2019 *UEFA Champions League runner-up: 2019–20 Chelsea *FA Cup runner-up: 2020–21, 2021–22 *EFL Cup runner-up: 2021–22 *UEFA Champions League: 2020–21 *UEFA Super Cup: 2021 *FIFA Club World Cup: 2021 Bayern Munich *Bundesliga: 2022–23 Individual *VDV Bundesliga Coach of the Season: 2015–16 *Premier League Manager of the Month: March 2021, October 2021 *German Football Manager of the Year: 2021 *UEFA Men's Coach of the Year: 2020–21 *IFFHS Men's World's Best Club Coach: 2021 *The Best FIFA Football Coach: 2021 ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at kickersarchiv.de * * Category:1973 births Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Sportspeople from Bavaria Category:Living people Category:Borussia Dortmund managers
title: Thomas Tuchel
